website_summaries.verdict: The Mobile Edge ScanFast Backpack provides everything you'd need to comfortably carry your 17-inch laptop and travel accessories, with the added benefit of a butterfly zipper that may help you speed through airport security checks.
pros: may speed your way through security checkpoints
cons: The TSA agent may force you to take your laptop out anyway
not always easy to access the bottom of compartments

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but too small for my 17.3"
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag when I got it. It is well made with lots of space and extra pockets. Plus I really wanted a backpack as the only time I will use it is for travel. Not on a daily basis. I tried to put my ASUS 17.3" laptop in it but it is not big enough. It fit the long way (16.5") but not the depth which is 12.5" and the pocket in this bag is only about 12" wide. I was very disappointed to have to return it. If you have a smaller laptop go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: it's a backpack
customer_reviews.text: It is slightly more convenient to go through security and does not require your laptop to be completely exposed in one of those trays that go through the scan. For a frequent flyer it is worth it. Otherwise it's a backpack like any other. I will say that it is a bit too long for me - would be hard to deal with stuffing this under a seat - luckily the only time I've used it so far there was enough room in the overhead.
customer_reviews.author: 50+ Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great for the moderate traveler
customer_reviews.text: My job requires me to travel 30% of the time both domestic and international. I got this to make getting though the TSA screening and let me tell you it was worth every penny. The padding on the bag is a little heavy or I would have given the bag 5+ stars. The padding is more than enough for being knocked around in the overhead storage or under a seat. The backpack is comfortable to wear and strong enough to carabiner (karabiner) clip my CPAP so I can be hands free moving though the airport/train station.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit and have received many comments from other travelers because I just zip it open and move through! Love this product though I was hesitant after reading some reviews about wasted space and not enough room. I found none of those issues for me. This product has been a godsend and even fits better under the airline seats and in the overhead bins on the regional jets quite nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Hedberg

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This a nice Backpack. Bought two. First one is three years old now and seen a lot of travel. No issues...
customer_reviews.author: G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Travel made easier...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop pocket and zipper mechanisms makes TSA screening a breeze, at least as far as dealing with the computer. The dual pockets on the front don't suit me as well as the single larger pocket on my previous computer backpack; it's hard to find a good place to put the A/C charger brick in this backpack. Comfort while wearing is generally good, though the length of the backpack seems sized for someone a few inches taller than I am (5'7"). There are some pads on the outside which rest on your back as you wear it--a nice innovation.
customer_reviews.author: sugarlandsteve

customer_reviews.title: Still untested, but appears to be sufficient
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use it on a flight, but it served me well for some overnight road trips. Plenty of pockets and space for my 16" Dell, extra battery and accoutrements. Well padded and comfortable as a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Emcandbebe

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for large laptops !!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Targus case. Room for everything and a Dell 17" laptop. Carries well - nice straps. Supposedly "airport friendly" haven't tried that, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Melnic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for around a year and it's been just great!
customer_reviews.author: ericco

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This laptop backpack has lots of pockets for all of the accessories that must travel with a computer (power cords, mouse, etc.). The bag itself is a little larger than I would have expected but it does have to fit my 17" laptop. It is well padded. It lays flat for being x-rayed with the use of a single zipper. I would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe 71

customer_reviews.title: Back Pack Space Galore
customer_reviews.text: The back pack has turned out to be much better than I thought. I originally thought it would not be large enough for everything out of my old back pack, I was wrong.....room to spare. I travel almost every week and it is a pleasure not having to take the computer out. Only watch out is if you travel to Japan they still want the computer out of the bag. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: B. Klepp

customer_reviews.title: ScanFast lives up to it's name!!
customer_reviews.text: My new ScanFast back pack saves time and reduces hassle at airport security. It also has many pockets and holders that aren't advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Computer Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Looked for TSA approved computer backpacks at the mall, & found one in a luggage store for well over $200. Then came home and looked on-line at Amazon. This was a great looking bag on-line. It shipped INCREDIBLY fast and my husband LOVES it. If you're looking for a computer backpack this is the one you need. You won't beat the quality or the price!
customer_reviews.author: SouthMouth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: This backpack configuration makes air travel significantly easier with a laptop computer. My 17" laptop fits perfectly in the padded section. Zippers are robust securing all pockets and the split halfs of the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: L. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how tall this backpack is. I measured that it was 21" from bottom to top, which is longer than the product specs I read. It seems to be made for over-sized laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - Much too big for a MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Nice product unfortunately it was much too large for my MacBook. As a result I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: John ChiTown

customer_reviews.title: Well made, plenty of room, zips thru check points but...
customer_reviews.text: It's as advertised and I generally agree with the other reviews, however I don't think the bag was field tested for actually fitting well under the seat in front of you. It's also a bit heavy. If you have a really big laptop and carry a lot extra's with you and and can store it in an overhead - it'll be fine. Otherwise, much it will be empty space and you'll be hard pressed to get under the seat (and you can forget about what little leg room remains). For my needs, I need something more compact as I have a 13" X 10" Lenovo (bag is ~15" x 19") and limited accouterments.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough space and too tall
customer_reviews.text: I frequently travel and was looking for a back pack laptop bag that allowed me to go through the security checkpoint without taking my laptop out. This bag is great for that but not for anything else. Pros: Quick to process through security checkpoint. Great straps and back support. Cons: Too tall for a 15" and under laptop. Compartments are all stacked on top and front of each other. Some compartments are too narrow and deep. I wish this bag came in a much smaller size. The zippers should go further down when opening. I will be checking to see if they make any improvement on this bag in the future.
customer_reviews.author: noksukow

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Edge seems to know what they are doing
customer_reviews.text: The Mobile Edge MESFBP is quite roomy, is comfortable to carry, has a really nice rubber-coated handle, an external pouch for carrying a cell phone or MP3 player, plenty of compartments to store stuff, and literally stands on its own when you set it on the ground. The only knock I have against the product is that the external water bottle holder could be a little bigger so that larger bottles don't flop around as much. Standard sized water bottles seem to be fine. I can't wait to find out if the local airport security checkpoint has a problem with it.....they shouldn't. I will be telling my friends about this product.
customer_reviews.author: IT_Guy

customer_reviews.title: No Hassle
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new ScanFast Backpack, I go through Security with no hassle. Just unzip, flip and walk through. It's the best way to travel. My 17" MacBook fits perfectly, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Edge Scanfast Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Just used this on a trip for the first time and it worked great. Went through security and didn't have to take my laptop out. Plenty of storage for all my gadgets. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag! Very light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed how much lighter this bag is than the one I've carried for 10 years. I'm still struggling with finding things in it since there are so many pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Miller

product_meta.title: Mobile Edge MESFBP ScanFast Backpack (Black)
feature_bullets: Tested to meet the TSA guidelines for carry-on luggage
Checkpoint friendly case speeds up time going through security
Unzips fully to lay open for easy and quickly screening

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
